message:
Mr.X is the admin of an organization which is named Boogle !
Boogle has 0 employees till now. 
Boogle is as big as Google !
Mr.X decided to talk to the Egyptian Geeks asking everybody of them about his favorite Job !
Boogle Can be now ! after 1 hour, 1 day or even after 1 month !
Do u want to Join we,us and Mr.X at Boogle :D ? If so ? please tell us at 2 lines WHAT YOU CAN DO AT BOOGLE !

data.message: I have a Dream ... I love to be a creative developing user of a certain service ! ... So If I worked at Boogle I will be in the Creative thinking position ... Creating Ideas and asking people for its accuracy and applying it ... Dream Ended !
what?!
Ù…Ø§Ø°Ø§ ØªÙ‚ÙˆÙ„ ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚

I missed something in the story ?
I want to make Our Google !!
Do you know that Google has quote search engine called Boogle, This domain is not available unless you are okay with .com not
awesome idea :D
I think if you want to be creative then come up with your own google , changing one letter doesn't seem like a good start, no disrespect.
And what does the "B" stand for?! I have an interpretation in mind! -_-
Boogle and X are just examples. of course we have minds good enough for getting better initial names
That was my idea :3 But first the plan was to work in google to know how things work :D
I can run a special department that will specialize in mocking Google, Inc. Mocking will include fun facts, jokes, funny videos and open letters to share holders.
